synopsis.text: Ski ing through the stormy lagoon of Pagopago Island, Yusuke stumbles upon an extraordinary discovery - a baby dinosaur. With the help of his father, a marine biologist, they take the creature under their wing and name it Coo. As Coo grows, it becomes evident that it's a rare marine reptile, a baby plesiosaur, believed to have been extinct for 65 million years. However, their peaceful life is disrupted when French secret agents, tasked with protecting nuclear interests in the region, develop a keen interest in the prehistoric creature. As the threat of nuclear testing looms, Yusuke and his father must protect Coo from being captured, sparking an unexpected chain of events. Will they be able to safeguard Coo and prevent the nuclear tests? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
